snippet.title: Halo: Combat Evolved - Demake [Game Boy] Demo
snippet.description:
Game Created by Sofaswordsman, Crusader Games

On November 15, 2001, Bungie released its legendary first-person shooter for the original xBox. As a longtime fan of Halo: Combat Evolved, Sofaswordsman is creating a faithful demake for the Game Boy Color using GB Studio. It's a demo with the first level, the Pillar of Autumn and the author has plans to continue adding levels to the project as time allows. Can you blast through the hoards of Covenant boarders and escape the ship alive? What lies ahead on the mysterious ring formation?
